EmailTemplate.description: Automated email acknowledgment sent to individual upon submission of an online volunteer application.
EmailTemplate.name: Volunteer Application Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for expressing interest in volunteering with {!Organization.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for expressing interest in volunteering with {!Organization.Name}.
We have successfully received your application submission. We will review your application shortly. Someone from our team will then reach out to you with additional information.
Sincerely,
John Smith, CEO HN Foundation
HN Foundation is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. If you have any questions, please email development@HNFoundation.org.
355 Apple Creek Blvd Suite 200 Markham Ontario Canada L3R 9X7 Phone: 905-752-1400 Â© HN Foundation All rights reserved
